text: "I've Gotta Get a Message to You" is a 1968 song written by Bee Gees. It was taken from their fifth studio album Idea. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, South Africa, Ireland and Italy, number 2 in New Zealand and the Netherlands, number 8 in the United States, number 6 in Switzerland and Norway and number 3 in Australia, Canada and Germany. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Bee Gees songs Category:Robin Gibb songs Category:Keith Urban songs
title: I've Gotta Get a Message to You
